ygData.subject: RE: Post Patch Procing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The thing that bothered me is that while you re activating an item, you cannot start a song.  So rather than fix it so we could activate items while
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 21 Jan 2000, John Tatsukawa wrote:
>
> You think the adjustment Verant made to "activatable items" has somehow
> affected the "proc"? I definitely noticed the delay when I activated my mask
> of deception. Had to wait for a couple of seconds before the spell was cast.
> I also noticed that when I moved the spell was "interrupted", but then
> continued.

The thing that bothered me is that while you're activating an
item, you cannot start a song. So rather than fix it so we
could activate items while singing, they made it that we had
to stop singing and stay stopped to activate them. :(

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
